title: Chronological Events Table Creator
goal: Arrange historical events chronologically and present them in table format.
prompt: Arrange the following historical events in chronological order and display them as a table. List all the events with appropriate dates. Sort them from earliest to latest.\n{events}.

responses.gpt-5:
Here’s a chronological arrangement of the given historical events from World War I, presented in a clear table with dates:

| Date                           | Event                                           |
| ------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------- |
| 28 June 1914                   | Assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand       |
| 28 July 1914                   | Austria-Hungary declares war on Serbia          |
| 1 August 1914                  | Germany declares war on Russia                  |
| 3 August 1914                  | Germany declares war on France                  |
| 4 August 1914                  | Germany invades Belgium; Britain enters the war |
| 6–12 September 1914            | Battle of the Marne                             |
| 22 April – 25 May 1915         | Second Battle of Ypres (use of poison gas)      |
| 21 February – 18 December 1916 | Battle of Verdun                                |
| 1 July – 18 November 1916      | Battle of the Somme                             |
| 6 April 1917                   | USA enters the war                              |
| 11 November 1918               | Armistice signed; fighting ends                 |
| 28 June 1919                   | Treaty of Versailles signed                     |
responses.gemini-2.5:
Here is the corrected chronological order of World War I events:

| Event | Date |
| :--- | :--- |
| Assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand | June 28, 1914 |
| Austria-Hungary declares war on Serbia | July 28, 1914 |
| Germany declares war on Russia | August 1, 1914 |
| Germany declares war on France | August 3, 1914 |
| Germany invades Belgium; Britain enters the war | August 4, 1914 |
| Battle of the Marne | September 6–12, 1914 |
| Second Battle of Ypres (use of poison gas) | April 22 – May 25, 1915 |
| Battle of Verdun | February 21 – December 18, 1916 |
| Battle of the Somme | July 1 – November 18, 1916 |
| USA enters the war | April 6, 1917 |
| Armistice signed; fighting ends | November 11, 1918 |
| Treaty of Versailles signed | June 28, 1919 |
responses.claude-3:

| Date | Event |
| ---- | ----- |
| June 28, 1914 | Assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand |
| July 28, 1914 | Austria-Hungary declares war on Serbia |
| August 1, 1914 | Germany declares war on Russia |
| August 3, 1914 | Germany declares war on France |
| August 4, 1914 | Germany invades Belgium; Britain enters the war |
| September 6-12, 1914 | Battle of the Marne |
| April 22-May 25, 1915 | Second Battle of Ypres (use of poison gas) |
| February 21-December 18, 1916 | Battle of Verdun |
| July 1-November 18, 1916 | Battle of the Somme |
